meanings.definition: The quality of being poorly made or of inferior workmanship.
meanings.sent1: The shoddiness of the toy was evident in its loose parts.
meanings.sent2: The customer complained about the shoddiness of the product.
meanings.sent3: The shoddiness of the cake made it look like a lopsided tower.
meanings.sent4: The shoddiness of the building's foundation was like a house of cards waiting to collapse.
meanings.sent5: The shoddiness of the painting was so apparent that even a child could see it.

meanings.definition: The state of being of low quality or value.
meanings.sent1: The shoddiness of the fabric was disappointing to the buyer.
meanings.sent2: The company's reputation suffered due to the shoddiness of their service.
meanings.sent3: The shoddiness of the joke made everyone laugh at its silliness.
meanings.sent4: The shoddiness of the excuse was like a flimsy shield against the truth.
meanings.sent5: The shoddiness of the performance left the audience unimpressed and bored.
